activities: We collect email addresses and first name and last name from users who choose to signup to our service. This information is used to contact that person when we have matched them to content or other postings on the site.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: First name, last name, email address. Nothing is manual.
recoursemech: We are compliant with privacy programs that incorporate the Safe Harbor Principles into our rules and include effective enforcement mechanisms.  We will cooperate and comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
